chapters.title: Chapter 13: What Must Be Done
chapters.info: Vora, p. 271—Owner or creator of the white fluted sa'angreal Egwene borrowed from the Tower stores to fight the Seanchan. The same sa'angreal was used by Siuan Sanche, then the Amyrlin seat, to separate Mat from the dagger he took from Shadar Logoth. It is the most powerful sa'angreal the Tower has in its stores. Egwene has used it a lot in recent weeks, and is beginning to feel an affinity for it.
